opendial.domains.rules.conditions

Interface Condition

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicCondition, ComplexCondition, NegatedCondition, TemplateCondition, VoidCondition

    public interface Condition
    Generic interface for a condition used in a probability or utility rule.

    A condition operates on a number of (possibly underspecified) input variables, and can be applied to any input assignment to determine if it satisfies the condition or not. In addition, the condition can also produce some local output, for instance based on slots filled via string matching.

    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-03-20 21:16:08 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)

      Returns the input variables of the condition (as templates).
      boolean isSatisfiedBy(Assignment input)
      Returns true if the condition is satisfied for the given assignment, and false otherwise
